title: Evidence Bundles and zk‑Proofs: Verifying Claims Without IP Leakage
summary: How signed evidence and optional zk‑proofs validate privacy bounds and performance claims.
bodyMd:
## Why

Buyers want assurance without source code. Signed bundles plus optional zk‑proofs verify bounds while protecting IP.

## What’s Inside
- Lineage and hashes
- Utility/Privacy metrics
- Ablation traces
- Optional zk on privacy bounds

## Platform Tie‑In
Export from Reporting; attach to listings and contracts.
